A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Kylo Ren was amazing\, Porgs were cute\, the action was great.  The only downfall was that I still don't feel a strong connection to the good guys the same way I did for characters like Obi wan.  Who knows maybe that will come with time.  Contrary to everyone else\, I think Luke's role was great\, I thought it was a great conclusion to his role in the series!
